activate_rotor.description: Activate the fan's rotor to start its rotation.

stop_rotate_rotor.description: Stop the rotation of the fan's rotor.

wipe_rotor_clean.description: Clean the rotor effectively to get rid of dust.

pause_rotor_movement.description: Pause the movement of the fan's rotor.

clean_rotor_surface.description: Clean the rotor's surface for maintenance.

initiate_rotor_rotation.description: Initiate the rotation of the fan's rotor.

halt_rotor_movement.description: Halt the rotation of the fan's rotor.

restart_rotation.description: Restart the rotation of the fan's rotor.

halt_rotation.description: Halt the rotation of the fan's rotor.

polish_rotor.description: Polish the rotor to maintain its functionality.

start_rotation.description: Initiate rotation of the fan's rotor.

pause_rotation.description: Pause the rotation of the fan's rotor.

wipe_rotor.description: Clean the rotor to remove dust buildup.

start_rotor.description: Start the rotation of the rotor

stop_rotor.description: Stop the rotation of the rotor

clean_rotor.description: Clean the rotor to remove dust or any other particles.

restart_rotor.description: Restart the rotating mechanism of the fan's rotor.

clean_frame_surface.description: Wipe the frame effectively to remove dust and other particles.

wipe_dust_frame.description: Wipe the fan's frame to remove accumulated dust for better performance.

sanitize_frame.description: Sanitize the fan frame to remove germs and bacteria.

clean_frame.description: Clean the fan frame to remove accumulated dust.

clean_fan_frame.description: Wipe clean the fan frame to remove dust and dirt.

restart_clean_fan.description: Restart the rotation of the rotor after cleaning the entire fan.

sanitize_then_run.description: Clean the fan thoroughly, then start rotor.

clean_fan_then_run.description: Clean the entire fan and then run the rotor.

run_sanitized_fan.description: Clean the fan thoroughly, then run the rotor.

clean_Rotate.description: Clean the entire fan, then rotate the rotor.

run_Clean.description: Start the rotation of the rotor and then clean the entire fan.

sanitize_and_restart.description: Clean the entire fan, including the rotor and frame, then restart the rotor.

rotate_and_sanitize.description: Start the rotor first, then sanitize the entire fan.

sanitize_rotor_and_frame.description: Sanitize all parts of the fan, including the frame and the rotor.

restart_then_sanitize.description: Restart the rotor and then sanitize the whole fan.

sanitize_then_restart.description: Clean the rotor first and then restart rotation.

clean_and_initiate.description: Clean the entire fan, including the rotor and frame, then initiate the rotation of the rotor.

initiate_and_clean.description: Start the rotor first, then clean the entirety of the fan.

clean_all.description: Clean all parts of the fan, including the frame and the rotor.

initiate_and_wipe.description: Initiate rotor and then clean the whole fan.

wipe_and_rotate.description: Clean the rotor first and then begin rotation.

clean_and_start.description: Clean the entire fan, including the rotor and fan frame, then start the rotation of the rotor.

start_and_clean.description: Start the rotation of the rotor, then clean the entire fan.

clean_whole_fan.description: Clean the entire fan, including the rotor and fan frame.

rotate_and_clean.description: First rotate the rotor, then clean the entire fan.

start_and_clean_fan.description: Start the rotation of the fan's rotor and clean the entire fan.

clean_and_start_fan.description: Clean the fan's rotor and the fan frame and then start the rotation of the rotor.

clean_then_stop_fan.description: Clean the fan's rotor and the fan frame and then stop the rotation of the rotor.
